title: Smart multi-environment, continuous delivery & deployment supporting multi-container technologies (Kubernetes, Docker swarm, ...)
Build restful API, microservices, and daemons tenfold faster by taking advantage of our rapid development framework.
Automatically generate your API and Daemon catalog by adding your GIT and visualize, test and simulate in multi environment and tenant fashion
Tired of re-inventing the wheel. Plug our middleware and swagger file and convert your API to multi tenant with superior quality using a multi environment registry.
Full monitoring with on-board analytics and 3rd parties integration (Galileo, Datalog, Runscope, ...) as well as Correlation between resources and traffic analytic vs errors in logs
Achieve and orchestrate high available and distributed cloud architecture with auto healing and scaling on multiple providers (AWS, google, azure, rackspace, private, ...)
Turn on continuous integration and take advantage of our ready template for Travis-ci, Drone-io, Jenkins, and others.
Take advantage of our resource deployment templates and deploy your resources on any cloud with a click of a button.
Complete and adaptable API Gateway, Traffic Control, Multi tenancy, Multi security and Productization
